content: birgitta s bookmark ©torunjohansson ©torunjohansson birgitta s bookmark ©torunjohansson this bookmark was inspired by a bit of lace on a bedsheet that my grandmother made in the 1930 s it s an easy pattern that works up quickly and makes a great last- minute gift for any booklover i designed it for my mother birgitta many years ago she was an avid reader and there were always piles of books all around our home my mother would often read several books at a time each book needed a bookmark of course and it was my job to provide them materials yarn scheepjes maxi sweet treat or any lace weight yarn hook 1 50 mm or smaller if you tend to crochet loosely us standard crochet terms st = stitch half_double_crochet = half double_crochet chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet chsp = chain space shell = five double_crochet in same stitch slip_stitch = slip_stitch skip = skip single_crochet = single_crochet instructions to begin chain 11 + 5 r1 single_crochet in 8th st from hook chain 4 skip 4 st and single_crochet in 5th st ch2 skip 2 st half_double_crochet into last st turn r2 chain 1 single_crochet into same st skip chsp 5dc in following single_crochet first shell is made slip_stitch into ch4sp 5 double_crochet in next single_crochet second shell made skip 2ch and single_crochet into 3rd chain turn r3 chain 5 single_crochet into 3rd double_crochet of shell chain 4 single_crochet into 3rd double_crochet of next shell chain 2 and double_crochet into last st turn repeat row 2-3 until you reach desired length 1 ©torunjohansson chart = slip_stitch = chain 3 = single_crochet 2 = half_double_crochet 1 = double_crochet border optional when you ve reached the desired length you can make a border by working single_crochet all around the bookmark this will make the bookmark sturdier and give it a more finished look along the top ch1 and single_crochet in same st 3sc in chsp skip st and 4sc in next chsp skip next st and in following chsp work 3sc ch1 3sc = corner now continue down the side side skip all stitches and work only in the chain spaces 3sc in each chsp until you reach the bottom corner bottom continue in same chsp corner and work ch1 3sc skip st 4 single_crochet skip st and in following chsp work 3 single_crochet ch1 3sc side continue up the side as you did the first side when you reach the top slip_stitch or work an invisible join in first single_crochet of border fasten_off final touches add a fringe if desired block the bookmark copyright ©torunjohansson this pattern is for unlimited personal use only please do not sell this
